data.title: Ralph Hanan - Remote Session Drummer - New Jersey
data.meta_description: Remote Session Drummer Ralph Hanan - Listen to samples, read reviews, learn more, contact. Read interview with Ralph Hanan, see credits and hire
data.text:
Solid pocket drummer that will play for your song, not a drummer's ego. Focus is on groove, tone and clean, warm, recordings. I can record high quality drums remotely and send you raw files and/or I can add some EQ and effects if you'd like some direction on what I had in mind while tracking. Available for in-person sessions in NJ, NY, Philly.

I get great drum sounds in my home studio and I am able to record a variety of styles specializing in Rock, Pop, Country, Americana, R&B. I'm not the guy for super heavy or super fast drumming. But if you are looking for great feel and grooves, warm and sonically interesting drum sounds, let's chat.

Click the 'Contact' above to get in touch. Looking forward to hearing from you.
